title: AVVIN Tirupur Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Veterinary Consultant Posts
description: The Tirupur District Co-Operative Milk Producers Union Limited (AAVIN) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Veterinary Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.V.Sc. can grab this chance and apply for the AVVIN Tirupur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the giv...
